purpose: To provide a comprehensive toolkit for monitoring AI agents, tracking costs associated with large language models (LLMs), and benchmarking their performance across various frameworks.
principle: To enhance the efficiency and transparency of AI agent operations by providing detailed insights and analytics, allowing developers to make informed decisions.
reusability: The SDK is designed to be modular, enabling developers to integrate it easily into existing workflows and applications across different programming environments.
limitations: As an alpha version, the SDK may have incomplete features and potential bugs. Users should expect limited documentation and support as the project evolves.
name: agentops
description: Python SDK for AI agent monitoring, LLM cost tracking, benchmarking, and more. Integrates with most LLMs and agent frameworks including OpenAI Agents SDK, CrewAI, Langchain, Autogen, AG2, and CamelAI
